VRF_TEST_WRONG_NAME.desc: Configure wrong value for vrf name.

VRF_TEST_INVALID_LONG__NAME.desc: Configure invalid length value for vrf name.
VRF_TEST_INVALID_LONG__NAME.eStr: Invalid interface name length, it must not exceed 16 characters.

VRF_TEST_WITH_FALLBACK.desc: Configure VRF with fallback in VRF table.

VRF_TEST_WITH_VNI.desc: Configure VRF with VNI in VRF table.

VRF_TEST_WITH_VNI_OOR.desc: Configure VRF with out of range VNI in VRF table.
